Package edu.uoc.pac2

Class RPGCharacter

java.lang.Object
edu.uoc.pac2.RPGCharacter
public class RPGCharacter extends Object
This class represents a simple RPG character

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private char
    alignment
    The alignment of a member of the RPCCharacter class, could be Alliance (A), Horde (H) or Neutral (N)

    The characters that cannot appear on the name

    The number of hitpoints a member of the RPCCharacter class starts with

    private static int
    nextId
    The value for the next character that is created

  • Constructor Details

    • RPGCharacter

      public RPGCharacter()
      Basic Constructor for the RPGCharacter class

    • RPGCharacter

      public RPGCharacter(String name, char alignment) throws Exception
      A Constructor for the RPGCharacter class
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the RPGCharacter
      alignment - The name of the alignment of an RPGCharacter
      Throws:
      Exception - When alignment is not 'H' 'A' or 'N', or when name contains an invalid character

    • RPGCharacter

      public RPGCharacter(String name, char alignment, int life) throws Exception
      Basic Constructor for the RPGCharacter class
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the RPGCharacter
      alignment - The name of the alignment of an RPGCharacter
      life - The starting number of hitpoints of an RPGCharacter
      Throws:
      Exception - When alignment is not "A", "H" or "N", when name contains an invalid character, or when life is negative

    • updateLife

      public void updateLife(int life) throws Exception
      Update life to increase or decrease hitpoints
      Parameters:
      life - Amount healed or damaged
      Throws:
      Exception - When player is dead, or when life > (this.life / 2)

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Getter of isAlive
      Returns:
      Whether RPGCharacter is alive

    • setAlive

      private void setAlive(boolean alive)
      Setter of isAlive. If isAlive == false, updates lastDeath to current time
      Parameters:
      alive - New value of isAlive

    • resurrect

      public void resurrect() throws Exception
      Restores life to 1 if a member of RPCCharacter has died
      Throws:
      Exception - When isAlive == true

    • getLastDeath

      public LocalDate getLastDeath()
      Getter of lastDeath
      Returns:
      date of the last time an RPGCharacter died

    • setLastDeath

      private void setLastDeath(LocalDate lastDeath)
      Setter of lastDeath
      Parameters:
      lastDeath - New lastDeath to set, provided that it is later than last known lastDeath

    • getAlignment

      public char getAlignment()
      Getter of Alignment
      Returns:
      alignment of a given RPGCharacter

    • setAlignment

      public void setAlignment(char alignment) throws Exception
      Setter of Alignment
      Parameters:
      alignment - New alignment to set
      Throws:
      Exception - When alignment is not 'H' 'A' or 'N'
